reviews.review:
Best game ever. 
11/10. 
You'll come back to this (actually, there is a huge amount of mods so the game is a never ending perfect puzzle game).
Genial wie Valve es schafft so eine Story in ein Puzzle Spiel einzubauen. Sieht man sonst wirklich selten, vorallem das Ende bereitet einen wunderbaren wow Moment
Очень интереснный сюжет
after some thinking... i think that this game can get "Test of time Award", maybe it is not that old, but awesome anytime
독창적인 퍼즐게임
THE BEST GAME FOR U AND YOUR GIRL! HIGHLY COMMEND"!
Najlepsza gra logiczna tego stulecia! Wciagajaca jak malo co, im trudniejsza zagadka tym przyjemniej sie ja rozwiazuje. Fabula jest dobra, ale niezbyt istotna. Polecam z czystym sumieniem.
Не игра а магия!!!
topzera
Rien à dire, c'est le meilleur de tous, prenez le et c'est tout !
This game is a very fun experience. Your mind is constantly challenged and you are always trying to solve the next puzzle.
Le meilleur des Portal pour moi

Ich habe Portal 2 nun bereits über 150 Stunden gespielt und spiele immer noch weite, ob es an der grandiosen Story liegt, oder an dem guten coop, ich weis es nicht. Neben der Story und dem coop gibt es natürlich auch die möglichkeit, den im spiel enthaltenen Level Editor zu benutzen (oder auch die möglichkeit den Hammer Editor zu benutzen), der dank des workshops nahezu unentlich Testkammern besitzt an denen man sich nie sattsehen kann. Die Workshoplevel sind größtenteils sogar ziemlich gut und machen alleine oder auch im coop sehr viel spaß. Alles in einem würde ich behaupten, das dass Portal Universum eines der besten Spielereien überhaupt ist und man es sich in einem Sale definitiv holen sollte.
Eccezionale su tutti gli aspetti: grafica, storia, puzzle ambientali da risolvere. Non può mancare nella vostra libreria!
C'est toujours un plaisir de rejouer à portal 2 (même au 1 d'ailleurs)

Игра Супер, но...
У Portal 2 есть огромный, страшный, безобразный изъян. Её мало. 14 часов одиночной кампании и «коопа» пролетают мгновенно, словно летний сон. Рука так и тянется к «New Game», чтобы пройти игру снова, наслаждаясь умными головоломками и острыми, как лезвие бритвы, репликами героев. Но в одну реку не войти дважды — чертова память цепко держит каждую задачку. Остается слушать божественную арию из финального ролика и уповать на скорую амнезию.
Este es para mí el mejor juego de todos los tiempos, lo tiene TODO.

Игра, которая заставит вас пройти сюжет, кооп, множество уровней сообщества, а потом перепроходить это снова и снова.
10/10 "Проверено временем"

Was soll ich hier noch sagen? Portal 2 ist ein Muss für jeden Gamer, der von sich behaupten will sich auszukennen. Großartige Puzzles, kreative Gameplay-Mechaniken, super Story und vor allem die Atmosphäre haut richtig rein!
Эта игра шедевр в своём жанре
best game story ever
10 PLEASANT HOURS IN THIS GREAT GAME
One of the best games ever made.
A saga de portal é simplesmente a coisa mais mágica que eu já vi, é mto foda, tenho nem o que falar, cada hora que eu passei jogando isso, era uma hora da vida minha acrescentada

Simply speaking, the sequel of the cool game Portal. One thing for sure, the return of the portal gun is never better that ever. The game also mention something about the background of Apture Science and how they became as of now. If you enjoy "portaling" in the previouse game. You should try this one as well
эта игру просто супер

Esse jogo é o mais pica das galáxias.
Mesmo terminando o modo história voce pode se divertir/se estressar com os amigos \:)

Whereas the original game was a one-off, somewhat short affair, adding in cheeky voice-overs on top of a fun and challenging game mechanic, this is a complete, fully-featured, blow-out epic. This is a journey that feels like you're fully immersed in the environment, able to explore and make choices, while having completely scripted moments where they'll have the most dramtic impact.

Not only is this one of my favorite games of all time, I consider it one of my landmark gaming experiences. This is a game everybody should play, even non-gamers, to understand both the gaming experiencing (how do I learn to overcome obstacles? achieve objectives? solve puzzles?) and build a narrative story. Valve did an incredible job with this "sequel" which is a full-formed story all by itself.

I'm nominating this for a Steam Award because it shook a jaded old school gamer from back in the 8-bit era out of their funk and said, "hey, there are still FPS games that can tell stories, have action and excitement, and investment emotion and excitment." 

Portal 2 did all that.

And if you *still* haven't played it and it's on sale? Buy it and play the damn thing.
Amo <3

This is probably my favourite game of all time. It's great plot, combined with gameplay that often had me scratching my head and firing portals in every direction, makes it enormous fun. However, it's also something of a piece of art. That's how good it is. Seriously. Get it.

This is a must play. If you enjoy puzzles, humor, action, cake or any of the above, get this game. Even if You don't like games, get this game. Very fun to play, and you'll be wishing for more. Workshop support built in, you can make and share levels from built in editor. You can also grab the free dev kit for the game to make advanced levels.

One of the best games ever made. A joy to play the first time through, a joy to play the third time through, a joy to watch my kids playing through. The campaign is brilliantly written, well-balanced, finely acted and just challenging enough with an excellent sense of humour. Plus there is endless joy in trying out others' maps and crafting your own. This game should be in everyone's collection.
